subclusters.subcluster_name: Senescence as Tumor Suppression and Aging Driver
Oxidative Stress-Induced Senescence via ROS and DNA Damage
Senescence-Associated Secretory Phenotype and Therapeutic Targeting

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Senescence as Tumor Suppression and Aging Driver
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on cellular senescence as a tumor suppressor mechanism that accumulates and drives aging and age-related diseases.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Senescence as Tumor Suppression and Aging Driver
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes senescence induced by telomere shortening and DNA damage activating tumor suppressor pathways leading to aging and vascular disease.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Senescence as Tumor Suppression and Aging Driver
theory_assignments.reasoning: Explores the trade-off between tumor suppression via apoptosis and senescence and aging acceleration due to tissue depletion.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Senescence as Tumor Suppression and Aging Driver
theory_assignments.reasoning: Details FOXO-mediated oncogene-induced senescence as a tumor suppressive mechanism linking ROS signaling to senescence and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Senescence as Tumor Suppression and Aging Driver
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on apoptosis and growth signaling trade-offs balancing cancer risk and aging, linked to senescence pathways.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Senescence as Tumor Suppression and Aging Driver
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes senescence in stem cell niches preventing mutant cell proliferation and cancer, linking senescence to aging and cancer risk.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Senescence as Tumor Suppression and Aging Driver
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on p53-mediated tumor suppression inducing senescence/apoptosis with trade-offs affecting longevity and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Senescence as Tumor Suppression and Aging Driver
theory_assignments.reasoning: Explains dual roles of senescence in tumor suppression and carcinogenesis via oxidative DNA damage and telomere shortening.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Senescence as Tumor Suppression and Aging Driver
theory_assignments.reasoning: Links progeroid syndromes and normal aging through cellular senescence as a tumor suppressive and aging mechanism.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Senescence as Tumor Suppression and Aging Driver
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on Werner syndrome as a model of accelerated senescence driven by genomic instability and oxidative stress.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Oxidative Stress-Induced Senescence via ROS and DNA Damage
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes TSP1-induced endothelial senescence mediated by ROS generation and p53-p21cip-Rb DNA damage response pathway.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Oxidative Stress-Induced Senescence via ROS and DNA Damage
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on oxidative stress causing premature senescence via ROS accumulation and Nrf2 antioxidant defense pathways.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Oxidative Stress-Induced Senescence via ROS and DNA Damage
theory_assignments.reasoning: Details TXNIP-AKT axis regulating glucose metabolism and ROS production leading to metabolic stress-induced senescence.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Oxidative Stress-Induced Senescence via ROS and DNA Damage
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes senescence in lung aging driven by telomere attrition, DNA damage, oxidative stress, and SASP-mediated inflammation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Oxidative Stress-Induced Senescence via ROS and DNA Damage
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on S6K1 regulation of SASP and inflammaging through ROS and inflammatory signaling pathways.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Oxidative Stress-Induced Senescence via ROS and DNA Damage
theory_assignments.reasoning: ATF7 suppresses senescence and SASP by epigenetic repression and reducing ROS, linking oxidative stress to senescence control.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Oxidative Stress-Induced Senescence via ROS and DNA Damage
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes impaired immune clearance of senescent cells due to aging-related anergy, with metabolic and inflammatory stress involvement.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Senescence-Associated Secretory Phenotype and Therapeutic Targeting
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on SASP as a driver of aging and senotherapeutic approaches targeting senescent cells to alleviate age-related diseases.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Senescence-Associated Secretory Phenotype and Therapeutic Targeting
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes senescent cell accumulation in endocrine organs, SASP effects, and senolytic interventions to improve aging outcomes.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Senescence-Associated Secretory Phenotype and Therapeutic Targeting
theory_assignments.reasoning: Highlights SASP secretion by senescent cells and senolytic drug interventions reducing systemic aging and tissue dysfunction.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Senescence-Associated Secretory Phenotype and Therapeutic Targeting
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on senolytic drugs targeting senescent cells and pathways to extend lifespan and healthspan.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Senescence-Associated Secretory Phenotype and Therapeutic Targeting
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes senescent cell burden causing aging phenotypes and senotherapeutics preventing senescence to extend healthspan.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Metabolic Regulation of Cellular Senescence by Dietary Factors
theory_assignments.reasoning: Explores how dietary branched-chain amino acids modulate tissue-specific senescence and mitochondrial function affecting aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Metabolic Regulation of Cellular Senescence by Dietary Factors
theory_assignments.reasoning: Reframes senescence as adaptive remodeling activation with beneficial early-life roles and pathogenic late-life hyperfunction.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Metabolic Regulation of Cellular Senescence by Dietary Factors
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on autophagy decline with age affecting cellular homeostasis, oxidative stress, and senescence-related aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Metabolic Regulation of Cellular Senescence by Dietary Factors
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes microglial senescence and immune exhaustion driven by oxidative damage and neuroinflammation in brain aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Metabolic Regulation of Cellular Senescence by Dietary Factors
theory_assignments.reasoning: Details senescence in lung cells tipping balance toward apoptosis and chronic inflammation in COPD pathogenesis.
